text: Focus on experiments, improve oneself, pursue truth, and create miracles!
There you are. Can you give me a hand? We really need those quality materials you brought here last time.
Doing experiments make me so happy! Is there anything more exciting than making new discoveries?
The strange blotches on the ceiling? Those are not swashes of failed experiments! Absolutely not!
I sense that I am close to unveiling a new and uncharted territory.
Be serious and focused. That's the most effective attitude to make an experiment work. Absolutely!
Good day! You look like you stayed up all night. Try one of my special concoctions. It'll freshen you right up!
Should I distill or extract it? And should I add more or less of the substance. What does it take to make a simple potion?!
